timeline.bodyText: what is the reason it changed?
timeline.author: sopel39
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,110 +13,81 @@ remote exchange (GATHER, SINGLE, [])
                                                 cross join:
                                                     cross join:
                                                         cross join:
-                                                            cross join:
-                                                                scan reason

replies.bodyText: The immediate reason is that an output column was pruned of the reason table (due to the introduced project-off rule). As a consequence, DetermineJoinDistributionType decided to flip Join sources.
replies.author: kasiafi
